title: Add /coderef-assistant Route - AI Assistant Dashboard
description: Create new route displaying workorders, stubs, and documentation with collapsible sidebar and markdown document viewer

context.motivation: Add dedicated AI Assistant dashboard to coderef-dashboard. Leverage existing sidebar architecture and theme system.
requirements: Create /coderef-assistant route in Next.js app directory
Build collapsible sidebar with 3 sections: Workorders, Stubs, Documentation
Display workorder list with details (tabular format)
Display stub list with card layout
Display markdown documentation with full-width viewer (reuse documentation-site pattern)
Use Lucide React icons (not emoji) for navigation
Sidebar collapses from full-width to icon-only (80px minimum)
Integrate with existing Theme, AccentColor, Sidebar contexts
Support dark/light mode using existing CSS variables
Fetch data from orchestrator sources (workorder-log.txt, stubs, .md files)

architecture.styling: Tailwind CSS + CSS variables (reuse dashboard theme)

ui_patterns.sidebar: Collapsible icon+label layout (matches CodeRef Prompts design)
ui_patterns.document_viewer: Markdown rendering via marked.js (reuse documentation-site pattern)
ui_patterns.layout: Sidebar + Content area with sticky header (reuse RootClientWrapper)
